root.name: Gyron
root.description: Gyron has the player trying to get through a maze guarded by laser towers and large rolling balls in order to reach the end. The designers of the game thought it so hard that they offered a Porsche 924 to the first person to solve the game before October 21st 1985 (the game being released in April of that year). In fact 60 people managed to do so and so a special version of the game was made and a play off was held for the prize.
